synopsis.text: With a heart full of anticipation for a love confession straight out of a shoujo manga, Yuu Koito finds herself disillusioned when a classmate's confession leaves her feeling indifferent. As she navigates her first year of high school, she encounters the charismatic and poised student council president, Touko Nanami, gracefully declining a suitor. Inspired by Nanami's elegance, Yuu seeks her guidance, only to find herself the object of Nanami's unexpected affections. As their relationship unfolds, Yuu grapples with her burgeoning feelings, unsure if this is the romance she's been longing for. Immerse yourself in this heartfelt journey of self-discovery, love, and friendship, as Yuu and Touko explore the complexities of their emotions in a tale that challenges the conventions of the perfect shoujo romance.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
